content: **ps ⭐️ i m a season 8 knit star ⭐️ shop this season s masterclasses $20 off during the early bird sales window april 21-30 here 1 ** a free version of this pattern can be found on my blog here 2 the spring league sleeveless hoodie is a sporty shell style tank that evokes memories of spring athletics and a general sense of nostalgia the classic drawstring hood v-insert neck triangle and rolled sleeve hems give personality and add to the classic appeal of this sweatshirt-inspired wardrobe staple meant to be well-loved and well-worn this piece has the perfect broken-in relaxed fit that allows for chic comfort and wearable ease shop the full kit here 3 **sizes** xs s m l xl 2xl 3xl 4xl suggested positive ease 10-12 /25 5-30 5cm pictured in a size s on model with 34 /86cm bust **finished dimensions** bust circumference 40 5 44 5 48 52 25 56 5 59 75 64 68 25 / 103 113 122 132 5 143 5 152 162 5 173 5 cm length 19 25 20 20 75 21 5 22 7 23 5 24 5 25 5 / 49 51 52 5 54 5 58 59 5 62 65 cm **difficulty level** intermediate **skills** knitting purling m1l m1r m1lp and m1rp increases picking up and knitting stitches along an edge traveling stitches k2tog and ssk decreases i-cords seaming kitchener s stitch grafting tubular bind off all patterns are written in standard us terms sign up for info on special offers sales and new pattern releases bit ly/townewsletter **connect** instagram @twoofwands facebook facebook com/twoofwands pinterest pinterest com/twoofwandsknits youtube youtube com/twoofwandsknits **help** join the crew of wands facebook group 4 to connect with
